name: InvoiceFactory
description: The InvoiceFactory allows withdrawing ERC20 tokens from a temporary Invoice. The InvoiceFactory use the bytecode of the Invoice contract with dynamic token and receiver addresses. The InvoiceFactory can compute the address for deposit and withdraw funds.

functionDecorators.name: computeAddress
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the wallet. Compute address for depositing funds using salt, token and receivers.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the erc20 token which will be deposited.

parameterDecorators.name: receiver
parameterDecorators.description: The address which will get tokens when withdraw.

returnDecorators.description: wallet the address of the wallet.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Witdraws erc20 tokens from the deposit wallet and send to the receiver.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the erc20 token which will be withdrawed.

parameterDecorators.name: receiver
parameterDecorators.description: The address which will get tokens.
